channel.title: Is It Possible
channel.description:
You know in Scar, how you can use the ClickMouse(x, y); and MoveMouse(x, y); methods? How can you do this in Java? And how you would you set the perimeters, like in Scar you use x, y, would it be the same in Java? Or would the coordinates be different?
Like, I just want to know if it's possible for a Java program to move your mouse icon to a specified location, if and if is possible, click that location.
Righto, Thanks. #38~

item.title: Is It Possible

How can you do this in Java?
And how you would you set the perimeters, like in Scar you use x, y, would it be the same in Java? Or would the coordinates be different?

Like, I just want to know if it’s possible for a Java program to move your mouse icon to a specified location, if and if is possible, click that location.

Righto,
Thanks.
#38~[/quote]

Class Robot.
